name: Dumbbell Goblet Squat
how_to_perform:
1. Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at your chest with both hands.

2. Begin by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes facing forward or slightly outward.

3. Engage your core and maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

4. Slowly lower your body down into a squat position, keeping your back straight and your knees behind your toes.

5. Push through your heels to return to the starting position, squeezing your glutes at the top of the movement.

6. Focus on proper form and go as low as you comfortably can while maintaining control throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Dumbbell Goblet Squat is a lower body exercise that primarily works the quads, hamstrings, and glutes while also engaging the abs and shoulders.
